tool_description: Analyzes customer message sentiment and emotional state to guide response tone and escalation decisions.

message_text.description: Customer message to analyze for sentiment

include_emotions.description: Whether to include detailed emotion analysis

error_messages: Empty message: Cannot analyze sentiment of empty message
Analysis failed: Unable to process message for sentiment
usage: Provide message_text and optionally set include_emotions. Returns sentiment scores and emotional indicators for response customization.

sentiment_score.description: Overall sentiment score (-1 to 1, negative to positive)

urgency_level.description: Urgency assessment: low, medium, high, critical
